Membership Levels

Overview

  • Best Western Rewards

    10pt per us dollar

    No points needed to qualify

  • Gold Elite

    10% more points per stay

    Must meet 10 nights or 10,000 points to qualify

  • Platinum Elite

    15% more points per stay

    Must meet 15 nights or 15,000 points to qualify

  • Diamond Elite

    30% more points per stay

    Must meet 30 nights or 30,000 points to qualify

  • Diamond Select

    50% more points per stay

    Must meet 50 nights or 50,000 points to qualify

Comparing Levels

Key

  • Best Western Rewards
  • Gold Elite
  • Platinum Elite
  • Diamond Elite
  • Diamond Select

Benefits

    Earn 10 points for every U.S. dollar spent or airline/partner rewards with each stay.

    Earn 10 points for every U.S. dollar spent or airline/partner rewards with each stay.

    Points never expire*

    Hotel stay rewards with no blackout dates†

    Exclusive guest service phone number

    Point purchasing for award redemption ($10 per 1000 points)* ***

    Best Western Rewards® branded key packet upon arrival †

    Exclusive elite only offers

    Welcome snack and beverage OR 250 bonus points†

    Best Available Room**

  • Indicates how your loyalty is rewarded at check-in!
  • * Applies to residents of the U.S., Canada, Caribbean, Asia South America, Central America, the Middle East, and South Africa only
  • ** Specialty rooms or suites may not qualify for room upgrades (applicable for hotels in U.S. and Canada only)
  • *** Transaction dependent on your financial institution
  • † Applicable for hotels in U.S. and Canada only
